words.defineEn: to a small extent or degree
words.defineVi: đến một mức độ nhỏ hoặc mức độ

examples: It's actually an incredibly good deal!
He invested wisely and became incredibly rich.
The Bartlett pear I bought from the farmers market was incredibly juicy.
The Persian melon I tried in Iran was incredibly juicy and sweet.
The basketball player is incredibly quick on his feet, able to outmaneuver anyone on the court.
words.defineEn: extremely or to a great degree
words.defineVi: cực kỳ hoặc đến một mức độ tuyệt vời

examples: Not working my foot.
Not paying attention.
The meeting won't take too much time.
Money can't buy happiness.
The dentist can't take any new patients.
words.defineEn: used when wanting to give a negative meaning to a sentence, phrase, or word
words.defineVi: được sử dụng khi muốn đưa ra một ý nghĩa tiêu cực cho một câu, cụm từ hoặc từ

examples: The hotel provides fresh towels for the guests every day.
My grandma bakes a delicious persimmon pie every Thanksgiving.
Every age has its book, after all.
The apple tree in our backyard produces juicy fruits every year.
My son reads twelve pages of his book every day.
words.defineEn: (used before a singular noun) including or referencing all the members of a group of things or people
words.defineVi: (được sử dụng trước một danh từ số ít) bao gồm hoặc tham chiếu đến tất cả các thành viên của một nhóm đồ vật hoặc người

examples: The prices at the luxury boutique were quite high.
The weather turned quite chilly in the afternoon.
My father is quite old now
Quite suddenly, her mind was made up.
He plays quite well.
words.defineEn: to a degree that is significant but not extreme
words.defineVi: ở một mức độ đáng kể nhưng không cực đoan

examples: The news really made my day.
That bacon sandwich really hit the spot!
The contractor is really taking their time.
Your friend really talks a blue streak!
That DJ's voice really sets my teeth on edge.
words.defineEn: used to put emphasis on a statement
words.defineVi: được sử dụng để nhấn mạnh vào một tuyên bố

examples: The cruise went very quickly.
Generally, the article reads very well.
The car holds the corners very well.
Her condition is very serious.
The design is very basic.
words.defineEn: to a great extent or degree
words.defineVi: đến một mức độ lớn hoặc mức độ
